text: A name tag is a badge or sticker worn on the outermost clothing as a means of displaying the wearer's name for others to view. == "Hello my name is" stickers == "Hello my name is" stickers, first introduced by C-Line Products in 1959, became hugely popular. Many graffiti artists have been known to use these stickers as tags. == References == ==Other websites== Category:Clothing Category:Identification
title: Name tag
